TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PutPropertyOperation extends System.Fabric.PropertyBatchOperation
Public NotInheritable Class PutPropertyOperation Inherits PropertyBatchOperation

summary.para: Puts the specified property under the specified name.

remarks.para: Note that if one fails, the entire batch fails and is not committed.
